section.title: Sign In and Sign Out
section.para: After registering your account, you can sign in to &PRODUCT; to go into your private mode.

step.para: Go to a Portal in the public mode by inputting URL in the address bar (e.g: http://localhost:8080/portal)
Click the Sign in link at the top right of the page if you are current in the Classic portal. The Sign in form appears:
Input your registered User name and Password .
Select the Remember My Login check box when you sign in &PRODUCT; at the first time if you want to automatically return to &PRODUCT; without signing in again. You can see for more details.
Click the Sign in button to submit the form or Discard to escape.

listitem.para: This option allows users to return to &PRODUCT; and be automatically authenticated based on the value of a cookie provided by the bvarlistentryser. Thus users do not have to perform an explicit authentication again.
To follow some steps to get the forgotten user name or password. Please refer [Portal:Account and Password Retrieval] for more details.
To sign into &PRODUCT; with user name and password.

step.para: If User Name does not exist or the User name/Password is invalid an alert message will appear. This alert requires you to input a recognised value. To attempt the login again; click the OK button on the alert message to be returned to the Sign In form. Enter User Name and Password again.
